synopsis.text: Gundam enthusiasts were treated to a spectacular visual feast in 1989, as a special animated short was unveiled to celebrate the franchise's first decade. This one-minute clip showcased the franchise's most iconic mobile suit robots from its initial 10-year run, thrilling fans with a dynamic display of their favorite models in action. Serving a dual purpose, this commemorative video also heralded the arrival of the next installment in the series, "War in the Pocket," building anticipation for the upcoming Gundam adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
